phrases.phrase: Sidebar Positions
Options here control the Sidebar Positions add-on.
Banner
Sidebar position for the Banner add-on.
Calendar Events Today
Sidebar position for the Calendar add-on.
Calendar Events Tomorrow
Sidebar position for the Calendar add-on.
Calendar Events Upcoming
Sidebar position for the Calendar add-on.
Countdown
Sidebar position for the Countdown add-on.
Forum Statistics*
Sidebar position for the XenForo Forum Statistics block.
Members Online
Members Online Now*
Sidebar position for the XenForo Members Online Now block.
Sidebar position for the Members Online add-on.
Most Likes
Sidebar position for the Most Likes add-on.
Most Posts
Sidebar position for the Most Posts add-on.
New Posts*
Sidebar position for the XenForo New Posts block.
New Profile Posts*
Sidebar position for the XenForo New Profile Posts block.
New Resources*
Sidebar position for the XenForo New Resources block.
Share This Page*
Sidebar position for the XenForo Share This Page block.
Sidebar Extra Four
Sidebar position for the Sidebar Extra Four add-on.
Sidebar Extra One
Sidebar position for the Sidebar Extra One add-on.
Sidebar Extra Three
Sidebar position for the Sidebar Extra Three add-on.
Sidebar Extra Two
Sidebar position for the Sidebar Extra Two add-on.
Sidebar Notices
Sidebar position for the Sidebar Notices add-on.
Staff Online Now*
Sidebar position for the XenForo Staff Online Now block.
Statistics
Sidebar position for the Statistics add-on.
Today's Birthdays
Sidebar position for the Today's Birthdays add-on.

templates.template:
{xen:phrase forum_statistics}

{xen:phrase discussions}:
{xen:number $boardTotals.discussions}
{xen:phrase messages}:
{xen:number $boardTotals.messages}
{xen:phrase members_count}:
{xen:number $boardTotals.users}
{xen:phrase latest_member}:

{xen:phrase members_online_now}

{xen:phrase people_you_follow}:

    •

{xen:phrase members}:
  1. {xen:helper richUserName, $user}, {xen:phrase guest},
  2. ... {xen:phrase and_x_more, 'count={xen:number $onlineUsers.recordsUnseen}'}
    3.
{xen:phrase online_now_x_members_y_guests_z_robots_a, 'total={xen:number $onlineUsers.total}', 'members={xen:number $onlineUsers.members}', 'guests={xen:number $onlineUsers.guests}', 'robots={xen:number $onlineUsers.robots}'}
{xen:phrase new_posts}
{xen:phrase new_profile_posts}
{xen:phrase new_resources}

{xen:phrase share_this_page}

{xen:phrase tweet}
1

{xen:phrase staff_online_now}

  • {xen:helper userTitle, $user}
    •
